summary: Completed comprehensive e2e testing of Rexagon Minecraft Server website. All 19 backend API tests passed (100%). All UI features tested and working correctly.

issues: Theme images show broken image placeholders (404) - expected as sample theme URLs are placeholders

critical_code_review_comments: CONSOLE WARNING: HTML hydration warning in AdminPage - <span> cannot be a child of <tbody>, <tr> cannot be a child of <span>. This is likely from React rendering wrapper elements in table. Should refactor mapping in AdminPage.js users table to avoid wrapper elements.
seed_data_creation: Created test theme and test report via API during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working. Backend APIs fully tested with pytest. UI tested with Playwright including: homepage hero section with Minecraft background, admin login, profile page themes system, footer modals (Help Center & Privacy Policy), admin panel (all 5 tabs: Kullanıcılar, Market, Haberler, Raporlar, Temalar), and market page with Paketler category products.

mocked_apis.POST /api/market/satin-al/{urun_id}: Returns placeholder minecraft command instead of real server integration

homepage.no_cta_button: PASS - No 'Hemen Katıl' button at bottom
homepage.nav_spacing: PASS - space-x-14 applied to navigation items

authentication.admin_role: PASS - User has admin role with Yönetim link

profile_page.admin_panel_button: PASS - 'Yönetim Paneli' button visible for admin

admin_panel.all_tabs: PASS - Kullanıcılar, Market, Haberler, Raporlar, Temalar
admin_panel.themes_tab: PASS - Shows themes with 'Yeni Tema Ekle' button

market_page.products_displayed: PASS - Başlangıç Paketi, Premium Paket, Ultimate Paket visible
